revised_title: The Evolution of the Understanding of Isotopes and Isomers in Radioactive Change
tldr: This article discusses the historical development of understanding isotopes and isomers in radioactive change. It highlights the contributions of key scientists like Rutherford, Soddy, and others in discovering and understanding isotopes, isomers, and the fundamental law of radioactive change. The article also explores the evolution of thinking around the determinism of radioactive properties and the fluctuations in radioactive decay.
